pli-tv-pvr2.4:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr2.4:1.1: Of the seven classes of offence in how many classes of offence are the offences for a nun who, filled with desire, … comprised?
pli-tv-pvr2.4:1.2: Of the seven classes of offence the offences for a nun … are comprised in three classes of offence:
pli-tv-pvr2.4:1.3: it may be in the class of offence involving Defeat; it may be in the class of offence that is a very grave one; it may be in the class of offence of wrong-doing …
pli-tv-pvr2.4:2.1: The offences for one who is partaking of … curds, having had them asked for,
pli-tv-pvr2.4:2.2: are comprised in two classes of offence:
pli-tv-pvr2.4:2.3: it may be in the class of offence that has to be Confessed; it may be in the class of offence of wrong-doing.
pli-tv-pvr2.4:3.1: Concluded is the Fourth Chapter: on Comprised In
